awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 12 wins & 11 nominations.

fullplot: Mitch became caught up with his career as a sport commentator and journalist. He ignored his girlfriend and did not make time to do things in life that are of the most value to a human being. Morrie was one of Mitch's professors in college and a famous scholar. One day Mitch was watching television and saw Morrie giving an interview stating that he is dying of Lou Gehrig disease or ALS.
plot: Mitch became caught up with his career as a sport commentator and journalist. He ignored his girlfriend and did not make time to do things in life that are of the most value to a human ...
title: Tuesdays with Morrie
writers: Mitch Albom (based on the book by)
